item.title: Topic 2: Darwin and Natural Selection
item.description: Reading First Reading questions one two See also First

item.title: Topic 1: Before Natural Selection
item.description: Reading Aristotle, excerpts from Physics and Parts of Animals (about 350 BCE). Handout, Blackboard. Note: This is short but dense. Try to work through it carefully; see the reading questions below ↓. William Smellie, “Of the Progressive Scale or Chain of Beings in the Universe” (1791). Note: This is an account of the relationships among all living things from the perspective of late-eighteenth century biology in England.
